response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It is a unique offering that holds immense value to you, just like it does to us. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This exceptional deal is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
